00026    /*
00027    * Constructor.
00028    */
00029    LinearRouseAutoCorr::LinearRouseAutoCorr(System& system) 
00030     : SystemDiagnostic<System>(system),
00031       outputFile_(),
00032       accumulator_(),
00033       data_(),
00034       projector_(),
00035       speciesId_(-1),
00036       nMolecule_(-1),
00037       nAtom_(-1),
00038       p_(-1),
00039       capacity_(-1),
00040       isInitialized_(false)
00041    {}
00042 
00043    /*
00044    * Destructor.
00045    */
00046    LinearRouseAutoCorr::~LinearRouseAutoCorr() 
00047    {}
00048 
00049    /*
00050    * Read parameters from file.
00051    */
00052    void LinearRouseAutoCorr::readParam(std::istream& in) 
00053    {
00054 
00055       // Read interval and parameters for AutoCorrArray
00056       readInterval(in);
00057       readOutputFileName(in);
00058 
00059       read<int>(in, "speciesId", speciesId_);
00060       read<int>(in, "p", p_);
00061       read<int>(in, "capacity", capacity_);
00062 
00063       // Validate input
00064       if (speciesId_ < 0)       
00065          UTIL_THROW("Negative speciesId");
00066       if (p_ < 0)               
00067          UTIL_THROW("Negative mode index");
00068       if (capacity_ <= 0)       
00069          UTIL_THROW("Negative capacity");
00070       if (speciesId_ < 0) 
00071          UTIL_THROW("speciesId < 0");
00072       if (speciesId_ >= system().simulation().nSpecies()) 
00073          UTIL_THROW("speciesId > nSpecies");
00074 
00075       speciesPtr_ = &system().simulation().species(speciesId_);
00076       nAtom_ = speciesPtr_->nAtom();
00077 
00078       // Allocate arrays
00079       int speciesCapacity = speciesPtr_->capacity();
00080       accumulator_.setParam(speciesCapacity, capacity_);
00081       data_.allocate(speciesCapacity); 
00082       projector_.allocate(nAtom_);
00083 
00084       isInitialized_ = true;
00085    }
00086 
00087    /*
00088    * Evaluate end-to-end vectors of all chains, add to ensemble.
00089    */
00090    void LinearRouseAutoCorr::setup() 
00091    { 
00092 
00093       if (!isInitialized_) {
00094          UTIL_THROW("Object is not intitialized");
00095       }
00096 
00097       // Get number of molecules and number of atoms per molecule.
00098       nMolecule_ = system().nMolecule(speciesId_);
00099       if (nAtom_ <= 1) UTIL_THROW("Number of atoms per molecule < 2.");
00100 
00101       // Initialize mode projection coefficients.
00102       double qMode = acos(-1.0) * double(p_) / double(nAtom_ - 1);
00103       if (p_ == 0) {
00104          for (int j = 0; j < nAtom_; ++j)
00105             projector_[j] = 1.0 / double(nAtom_);
00106       } else {
00107          for (int j = 0; j < nAtom_; ++j)
00108             projector_[j] = 1.0 / double(nAtom_) * cos(qMode*double(j));
00109       }
00110       projector_[0] -= 0.5/double(nAtom_);
00111       projector_[nAtom_ - 1] -= 0.5 / double(nAtom_);
00112 
00113       // Initialize the AutoCorrArray object
00114       accumulator_.setNEnsemble(nMolecule_);
00115 
00116       accumulator_.clear();
00117    }
00118 
00119    /*
00120    * Evaluate end-to-end vectors of all chains, add to ensemble.
00121    */
00122    void LinearRouseAutoCorr::sample(long iStep) 
00123    { 
00124       if (isAtInterval(iStep))  {
00125 
00126          Molecule* moleculePtr;
00127          Vector    r1, r2, dR, atomPos;
00128          int       i, j;
00129 
00130          // Confirm that nMolecule has remained constant
00131          if (nMolecule_ != system().nMolecule(speciesId_)) {
00132             UTIL_THROW("Number of molecules has changed.");
00133          }
00134 
00135          // Loop over molecules
00136          for (i = 0; i < nMolecule_; ++i) {
00137             moleculePtr = &(system().molecule(speciesId_, i));
00138 
00139             // Retrace non-periodic shape and calculate coefficients
00140             atomPos = moleculePtr->atom(0).position();
00141             dR.multiply(atomPos, projector_[0]);
00142             data_[i] = dR;
00143             for (j = 1; j < nAtom_; j++) {
00144                r1 = moleculePtr->atom(j-1).position();
00145                r2 = moleculePtr->atom(j).position();
00146                system().boundary().distanceSq(r2, r1, dR);
00147                atomPos += dR;
00148                dR.multiply(atomPos, projector_[j]);
00149                data_[i] += dR;
00150             }
00151          }
00152       
00153          accumulator_.sample(data_);
00154 
00155       } // if isAtInterval
00156 
00157    }
00158 
00160    void LinearRouseAutoCorr::output() 
00161    {  
00162 
00163       // Echo parameter to diagnostic log file
00164       fileMaster().openOutputFile(outputFileName(), outputFile_);
00165       writeParam(outputFile_); 
00166       outputFile_.close();
00167 
00168       // Output statistical analysis to separate data file
00169       fileMaster().openOutputFile(outputFileName(".dat"), outputFile_);
00170       accumulator_.output(outputFile_); 
00171       outputFile_.close();
00172 
00173    }

00176 }
